definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat

sentences.english: He could not see out of the foggy window.
sentences.chinese: 他不能从这雾蒙蒙的窗户看出去。

sentences.english: In this weather the cliff face was a foggy drop into infinity .
sentences.chinese: 在这种天气条件下，雾蒙蒙的悬崖隐入广漠无限之中。

sentences.english: It is always raining, or about to rain, in the mountainous city;
sentences.chinese: 这座山城时常下雨，要么就是雨雾蒙蒙。

sentences.english: We were running a little late and the weather was cold and foggy.
sentences.chinese: 时间有点晚，天气很冷还雾蒙蒙的。

sentences.english: It wasJuly 12, a humid and hazy Friday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 现在是7月12号，一个潮湿而雾蒙蒙的星期五下午。

sentences.english: Everything is blurred by the fog on the highway, please slow down.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路上雾蒙蒙的，请你减速慢行。

sentences.english: Eyeful rose willow catkins foggy dissolve a corner of the sky.
sentences.chinese: 满眼柔丝飞絮雾蒙蒙的溶了一角的天空。

sentences.english: It was difficult to see through the fogged up windows.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上雾蒙蒙一片，很难看到外面的东西。

sentences.english: The two great pillars, known as the Fallen Hearts, stand amid the mists.
sentences.chinese: 这两个伟大的支柱，被称为堕落之心，站在雾蒙蒙。

definition: (of mist, snow, floodwater etc) a vast expanse of whiteness
